title: Valley Forge National Historical Park: Education
body: Reading, Writing, and a Revolution! Valley Forge is central to America's independence as well as many other cultural and natural stories. Find lesson plans, kids camp info, plan your field trip and more as you use Valley Forge as your classroom.   We also offer tools for teachers to develop knowledge and techniques for bringing Valley Forge into the class room. Find out more about tools for your teacher's toolbox.                      Field Trips Bring your class to Valley Forge learn about the life of the soldier during the Revolutionary War. Read More        Lesson Plans How does broadening our perspectives to include missing points of view enhance learning about history? Download our lesson plans.
